thread.title: Egypt's amb. to Senegal asserts strength, depth of relations between Egypt, Senegal-SIS
thread.title_full: Egypt's amb. to Senegal asserts strength, depth of relations between Egypt, Senegal-SIS

title: Egypt's amb. to Senegal asserts strength, depth of relations between Egypt, Senegal-SIS
text: Media Center Egypt's amb. to Senegal asserts strength, depth of relations between Egypt, Senegal Thursday، 11 July 2024 - 09:16 PM Egypt's Ambassador to Senegal Khaled Aref asserted the strength and depth of ties between Egypt and Senegal, reviewing the latest positive development witnessed recently at the economic, political and cultural levels. In his word during a reception organized Thursday by the embassy on the 72nd anniversary of July 23 Revolution, the Egyptian ambassador said the relation between both countries witnessed further prosperity, especially in light of willingness of the Egyptian companies to enter Senegalese market in the fields of housing, renewable energy and food manufacturing. A number of agreements will be inked between both sides in the fields of fisheries, agriculture, training youth diplomats and information technology, Aref said. The embassy is working on boosting trade and investment ties via opening nontraditional markets for the Egyptian products including the seeds of wheat and rice, he added.
